meta_description: Every donation we receive helps ensure the future of Portsmouth museums, especially the Children’s Museum of Virginia. Become a supporter today!
hours_text:
## A museum just for kids!

[Get Tickets](http://web.archive.org/web/20251220115509/https://www.etix.com/ticket/e/1014449/childrens-museum-of-virginia-portsmouth-childrens-museum-of-virginia)

[Become a Member](/web/20251220115509/https://childrensmuseumvirginia.com/membership#coolkids)

*Tickets must be purchased in advance.

Right here in Portsmouth, VA.

## A place where learning  
is spelled F-U-N

#### Tax Deduction

Your gift to the Foundation, a registered 501(c)(3), is completely tax deductible.  
[Donate Now](http://web.archive.org/web/20251231011130/https://portsmouthmuseumsfoundation.org/gift/?utm_campaign=website&utm_source=direct&utm_medium=taxdeduct&utm_content=textlink)



#### Endowments

Learn more about the Foundation’s endowments through the Hampton Roads Community Foundation  
[Learn More](/web/20251231011130/https://portsmouthmuseumsfoundation.org/building-our-legacy-with-endowment-funds/)



#### Support the Children's Museum of Virginia

The Children’s Museum of Virginia has a major economic impact in the region and inspires thousands of kids each year.  
[Visit the Museum Website](http://web.archive.org/web/20251231011130/https://childrensmuseumvirginia.com/)

The impact of your support
